actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to amend the Administrative Procedure Act to provide that rulemaking hearings required by statute which primarily concern a single unit of local government, geographic area, or State be held within such unit, area, or State.

summary.text: Requires that rulemaking hearings which must be held under the Administrative Procedure Act and which primarily concern a single unit of local government, geographic area, or State be held within such unit, area, or State.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Administrative Procedure Act to provide that rulemaking hearings required by statute which primarily concern a single unit of local government, geographic area, or State be held within such unit, area, or State.
